entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:08 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 11:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -8.9°C
Wind: E 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or snow. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain at times heavy late in the morning. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning then to 60 gusting to 100 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 100 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the evening then diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
